definition: tuft of strong filaments by which e.g. a mussel makes itself fast to a fixed surface, to go along the rim, like a beard around the chin
details:
noun
- tuft of strong filaments by which e.g. a mussel makes itself fast to a fixed surface
= synonyms: byssus
- hairy growth on or near the face of certain mammals
- the hair growing on the lower part of a man's face
= synonyms: face fungus, whiskers
- a person who diverts suspicion from someone (especially a woman who accompanies a male homosexual in order to conceal his homosexuality)
- a tuft or growth of hairs or bristles on certain plants such as iris or grasses
verb
- to go along the rim, like a beard around the chin
= example: to go along the rim, like a beard around the chin
